content.question: Dr. Costa sampled a group of 500 middle-aged men to study the relationship between self-reported levels of church attendance and scores on a self-actualization scale. Which of the following research methods is Dr. Costa using to investigate these variables?

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
